alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Pope County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County; Southern Pope County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 7:03PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Newton, eastern Johnson and northwestern Pope Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 703 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holman, or 11 miles northeast of Clarksville, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lamar... Dillen... Devils Knob... Walnut... Bertha... Holman... Rosetta... Upper Buffalo Wilderness Area... Fort Douglas... Lutherville... Long Pool Campground... Crossroad... Swain... Haw Creek Falls Campground... Nail... Lurton... Mineral Springs Recreation Area... Wayton... Mossville... Mt Judea... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
